product.title: Product
product.bottomDescription: * Selling Fast! The SNOVA Plaziental series is running out of stock due to the 2021 Mother's Day Sale. Orders placed since today will be dispatched from 14/05/2021 onwards. We appreciate your understanding and apologize for the inconvenience.

email.title: E-mail address
email.bottomDescription: * Due to the abnormal reception of the hotmail system, please avoid using hotmail.

aboutDelivery.title: Delivery notes※
aboutDelivery.content:
1. Free shipping.
2. It usually takes about 3-5 working days to deliver, though the actual delivery date/time may vary according to the situation of the logistic company and the delivery area. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
3. It usually cost 3-5 days for delivery, but our products are selling too well recently. It may need more time. It may take about 2~3 weeks. We'll send SMS in the morning of delivery day. Please pay attention on phone, sorry for the inconvenient cause.

shippingMemo:
* 「農曆新年前兩週至除夕當天」及「端午節、中秋節前一週」為送禮旺季，故無法指定配送時段敬請見諒。實際送達時間，以物流公司的出貨日，送貨路線及貨量為主。
實際到貨時間仍需視宅配公司當日配貨交通狀況及貨量為主，我們將會為您備註，若因宅配公司送貨路線，交通狀況及貨量等緣故無法完全按照指定日期/時刻送貨，給您帶來不便，敬請見諒!謝謝!

header.title: The order information can be completed in about 1.5 minutes!

aboutDelivery.title: Delivery notes
aboutDelivery.content:
1. Free shipping.
2. It usually takes about 3-5 working days to deliver, though the actual delivery date/time may vary according to the situation of the logistic company and the delivery area. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
3. It usually cost 3-5 days for delivery, but our products are selling too well recently. It may need more time. It may take about 2~3 weeks. We'll send SMS in the morning of delivery day. Please pay attention on phone, sorry for the inconvenient cause.
